sqlMap.select:
select t.positionid,t.posicode,t.posiname from om_position t
ORDER BY t.positionid

SELECT OEL.EMPID empid, OEL.EMPCODE empcode, OEL.EMPNAME empname, OEL.GENDER gender, OEL.CARDTYPE cardtype, OEL.CARDNO cardno FROM OM_EMPLOYEE OEL, OM_EMPORG OEO,OM_POSITION T1,OM_EMPPOSITION T2 WHERE OEL.EMPID = OEO.EMPID AND OEL.EMPID = T2.EMPID AND T2.POSITIONID = T1.POSITIONID AND T1.POSICODE = #posiCode# and OEL.EMPSTATUS='on' ORDER BY OEL.DISPLAYORDER, OEL.EMPNAME ASC

SELECT ORGID AS orgid, ORGNAME AS orgname, ORGCODE AS orgcode, ORGDEGREE AS orgdegree, ORGTYPE AS orgtype, YSJGBH AS ysjgbh, ORGSEQ AS orgseq FROM OM_ORGANIZATION A WHERE 1=1
AND A.PARENTORGID = #parentid#
AND A.PARENTORGID IS NULL
AND A.ORGCODE = #startorgcode#
AND A.ORGID = #startorgid#
AND A.ORGDEGREE <= #orgdegree#
AND A.JGSX = #jgsx#
AND A.STATUS = 'running' ORDER BY DISPLAYORDER asc,ORGCODE asc

SELECT OEL.EMPID empid, OEL.EMPCODE empcode, OEL.EMPNAME empname, OEL.GENDER gender, OEL.CARDTYPE cardtype, OEL.CARDNO cardno FROM OM_EMPLOYEE OEL, OM_EMPORG OEO WHERE OEL.EMPID = OEO.EMPID AND OEO.ORGID = #orgid# and OEL.EMPSTATUS='on' ORDER BY OEL.DISPLAYORDER, OEL.EMPNAME ASC

SELECT GROUPID groupid,GROUPNAME groupname FROM OM_GROUP WHERE GROUPID IN
#groupArray[]#
ORDER BY GROUPID

SELECT OM_EMPLOYEE.EMPID empid, OM_EMPLOYEE.EMPNAME empname, OM_EMPLOYEE.EMPCODE empcode, OM_ORGANIZATION.ORGCODE orgcode, OM_EMPLOYEE.CARDTYPE cardtype, OM_EMPLOYEE.CARDNO cardno, OM_ORGANIZATION.ORGID orgid, OM_ORGANIZATION.YSJGBH ysjgbh, OM_EMPLOYEE.GENDER gender FROM OM_ORGANIZATION, t_groupmember, OM_EMPLOYEE, OM_EMPORG WHERE OM_EMPORG.ORGID = OM_ORGANIZATION.ORGID AND OM_EMPORG.EMPID = t_groupmember.memberid AND OM_EMPLOYEE.EMPID = t_groupmember.memberid AND OM_EMPORG.ISMAIN = 'y' AND OM_EMPLOYEE.EMPSTATUS = 'on' AND t_groupmember.GROUPID = #groupid# ORDER BY OM_ORGANIZATION.ORGDEGREE, OM_ORGANIZATION.DISPLAYORDER, OM_EMPLOYEE.DISPLAYORDER

SELECT OMGROUP.GROUPID groupid, GROUPMEMBER.FLAG flag, OMORG.ORGID orgid, OMORG.ORGCODE orgcode, OMORG.ORGNAME orgname, OMORG.ORGDEGREE orgdegree FROM OM_GROUPMEMBER GROUPMEMBER, OM_GROUP OMGROUP, OM_ORGANIZATION OMORG WHERE OMORG.ORGID = GROUPMEMBER.MEMBERID AND OMGROUP.GROUPID = GROUPMEMBER.GROUPID AND GROUPMEMBER.FLAG = 2 AND OMGROUP.GROUPID = #groupid# ORDER BY OMORG.ORGDEGREE, OMORG.DISPLAYORDER
SELECT ABF_T_ZZJGSB.ID, ABF_T_ZZJGSB.ZZJGSMC, ABF_T_ZZJGSB.GNSM, ABF_T_ZZJGSB.SXFL FROM ABF_T_ZZJGSB WHERE ABF_T_ZZJGSB.ID = #topid#

SELECT ID FROM ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB WHERE ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.TOPID = #topid#
AND ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.ORGID = #startorgid#
AND ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.ORGCODE =#startorgcode#

SELECT ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.ID id, ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.ORGID orgid, ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.ORGCODE orgcode, ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.ORGNAME orgname, ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.ORGDEGREE orgdegree, ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.ORGTYPE orgtype, ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.MAPPID mappid, ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.SOURCEORGTYPE sourceorgtype FROM ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB WHERE 1 = 1
AND ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.PARENTID =#parentid#
AND ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.ID =#startid#
AND ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.ORGDEGREE <=#orgdegree#
AND ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.SOURCEORGTYPE = 4
AND ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.JGSX =#jgsx#
AND ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.ORGTYPE IN
#orgtype[]#
ORDER BY ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.DISPLAYORDER, ABF_T_ZZJGGXSB.ORGCODE

SELECT ROLEID roleid, ROLENAME rolename, ROLETYPE roletype, ROLEDESC roledesc, APPID appid, AUTO auto, ROLETYPEFIELD roletypefield FROM AC_ROLE WHERE AC_ROLE.ROLETYPEFIELD = #jgsx# AND AC_ROLE.ROLETYPE = 0
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM AC_ROLE WHERE AC_ROLE.ROLETYPEFIELD = #jgsx# AND AC_ROLE.ROLETYPE = 0
SELECT auto autovalue FROM AC_ROLE WHERE AC_ROLE.ROLEID =#roleid#

SELECT OEL.EMPID empid, OEL.EMPCODE empcode, OEL.EMPNAME empname, OEL.GENDER gender, OEL.CARDTYPE cardtype, OEL.CARDNO cardno FROM OM_EMPLOYEE OEL WHERE OEL.EMPID IN ($empid$) ORDER BY OEL.DISPLAYORDER, OEL.EMPNAME ASC

select t.empid, t.empname, t2.orgid, t2.orgname from om_employee t, om_emporg t1, om_organization t2, om_position t3, om_empposition t4 where t.empid = t1.empid and t1.orgid = t2.orgid and t.empid=t4.empid and t4.positionid=t3.positionid and t3.positionid='41' and t1.orgid in($orgIds$) ORDER BY t.EMPNAME ASC

SELECT t.EMPID empid, t.EMPCODE empcode, t.EMPNAME empname, t.GENDER gender, t.CARDTYPE cardtype, t.CARDNO cardno from om_employee t, om_empposition t1, om_position t2 where t2.positionid='$positionId$' and t2.positionid = t1.positionid and t1.empid=t.empid
SELECT COUNT(OEL.EMPID) FROM OM_EMPLOYEE OEL WHERE OEL.EMPID in ($empid$)

SELECT OEL.EMPID empid, OEL.EMPCODE empcode, OEL.EMPNAME empname, OEL.GENDER gender, OEL.CARDTYPE cardtype, OEL.CARDNO cardno FROM OM_EMPLOYEE OEL, OM_EMPORG OEO,OM_POSITION T1,OM_EMPPOSITION T2 WHERE OEL.EMPID = OEO.EMPID AND OEO.ORGID = #orgid# AND OEL.EMPID = T2.EMPID AND T2.POSITIONID = T1.POSITIONID AND T1.POSICODE = #positioncode# and OEL.EMPSTATUS='on' ORDER BY OEL.DISPLAYORDER, OEL.EMPNAME ASC

SELECT REC_ID groupid,GROUP_NAME groupname FROM T_GROUP WHERE GROUP_CREATOR = #empid# or IS_WHOLEBANK = '1'
ORDER BY GROUPID
